title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Maze Lost
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: An overconfident solo traveler gets hopelessly lost in the labyrinthine converted medina hostel and dies of dehydration in a sealed-off wing that nobody knew existed.

death_teaser: He couldn't find the bathroom. They couldn't find his body.
